name: waifu2x-image-saver
title: Waifu2x Image Saver
description: Upres your images with a right click away using Waifu2x
author: matthewn4444@gmail.com

preferences.name: prevent-recursion
preferences.title: Do not Upscale Continuously
preferences.description: Disallow images to continuously upscale until image exceeds server size limits; only upscale images once making images save faster.

preferences.name: allow-small-images-continuously-upscale
preferences.title: Allow Small Images to Continuously Upscale
preferences.description: Normally small images [640x640 area] scales once because they look ugly when upscaling more than once, enabling this allows you to scale small images multiple times.
